title: She Feels Just Like Home 🤞
message: I promise I'll build a home with no shouts of frustration and anger. If I ever build us a home, I promise it will be more than just a place to retreat when life outside weighs heavily on our shoulders.if i ever build us a home, It will make you feel hugged the moment you open the door after a tough day, for it would be my love that welcomes you at the threshold.If I ever build us a home, I promise not to decorate it only with furniture but to fill every corner with the love. I swear you'll be able to read me like a book.  Just as I will understand yours, you will understand the entirety of me. Sometimes, home isn't just a place; it's the feeling of being entirely and unconditionally loved by my princess. You are my home.

title: Simp for my Sweetheart 💘
message: How lucky am i to have someone that makes saying good bye so hard. Can i talk about that smile please, the damn cute smile and the giggles u do. Your giggles and your laughhhh. 🫡 Would do anything to bless my ears with them. Keep smiling and giggling and laughing (to me of course). That person whose shoulders i would fall asleep. I want to grow old with you. I love your lips. I should have written a paragraph for every part separately but koi ni. I mean your lips are cute. Cute cute. V red. Very cute. V cute. Get it (please get it). You are always in my head and heart. Wherever you go, ill always be next to you and vice versa. I love you ❤️. I will take care of you now. I will make sure you feel loved, appreciated throughout everything, you before anything my adorable squishy human. WALLAH MY DEAR WOMAN, YOU BRING ME CALMNESS AND PEACEEEEE.

title: Fatima is Life ♾️
message: You have make me wanna live. You make all my problems go away. You make me forget all of them. Its always gonna be you. You drive me crazy and its all right and its alllllll right with me. One look all it takes maam. And since we met, lately its u in my mind. I dont see nobody but you. I alwaysssss wanted a shortie cutie. A proper shawty. I found mine. I am gonna carry you around, show you the world, on my shoulders. You need to just say and it will be yours. After all you are my princess. You are a 10/10 and i cant wait. Your voice does magic to this heart. I swear dil beth jata hai when i listen to your voice. Skips a beat. My hearttttt feels like it should do when in love but khair ab yeh darakhta hi apkay liye. Phir wohiiii jou kay im saying from day one. You are my calm. You ease my mind.

title: These Eyes, MA'AMMMMMMM 👀
message: And your eyes deserve to see everything and tell you that look there is nothing much in this world prettier than me. And i mean look at your eyes, they are the prettiest in this world. And they look for me 😵. Your eyes are the one to die for. Imagine sun hitting your hazel brown caramel eyes and maaaaaaaaaam you should knoww you are the calm to this head. i want you so bad. i'm madly in love with you. i'm obsesssed fifi. I love your maturity, your style, your way of taking care, your love. I genuinely want to be a better human for you, your are my motivation, my daily dose of peace, my daily dose of laughter. my go to, my favourite, my human. I love you way too much. I want to give you the whole world, my everything. sab doon ga, sab. Jou bolo gi apko dilwaon ga, jitni baar bolo gi dilwaoon ga.

title: SHE IS ALL THESE 🫂❤️
message: WIFE MATERIAL 👰, HONEST 🤝, MOODYYYY 😤 (got no problems frrr), GREEN FLAG ✅, ORANGE FLAG 🟧, Resilient 💪, a literal sweetheart 💖, Adorable 🥰, loyal 👸, trustworthy 🤞, PERFECT CUTEST VOICE 🎶, my baby (literal baby) 👶, A PRINCESS 👑 (you will become a queen 👸), SUPPORTIVE 🤗, emotionally strong 💞, Strong willpower 🧠, Respectful 🙏 (I swearrr the way you have so much grace), Charming 🌟, BEAUTIFUL 😍, ATTRACTIVE 😘, THE BEST CHEF IN THE WORLD 🍳, Graceful 💃 (I swear to Allah), Affectionate 🤗, WISE 🦉 (I SWEAR THE MOVE IN THAT LUDO GAME), Intelligent 🧠, Chalak 🤔, Reasonable 🤓, TALENTED 🌟, Lovely 💖, Lover girl 💕, CALMING 🌊, PEACEFUL 🕊️ (SO MUCHHH), Cute 😍 (how can I forget this), PATIENT 🧘, FORGIVING 🙏, CARINGGGGGG 🥰, MOTHERLY 👩‍👧 (ABSOLUTELYYYYY), YAPPER 🗣️ (YOU AREEEE), ENCOURAGING 👏, MAKES ME A GOOD MAN 🧑‍🤝‍🧑.

title: Woman of my Dreams 👸🏽💖🌟
message: You are the peace of my mind, you give me strength, you make me weak (like as in a good way), you make feel comfortable, at ease, at peace, v calm actually. Honestly, I just want to spend each and every second of my life doing things with you that would make you happy. I care way too much for you. I live for you and you alone. But i deeply apologize for what I did yesterday and it hurts me that you sleep feeling not so good and all. Everything about you is worth admiring. Everything about you is perfect. How wonderful you are with everything and how well you handle and deals with things. You are wallah the perfect human in this world and I cant wait to share the rest of  our lives with each other, hand in hand, right with each other. And you can trust me, fifi. You are the best and the beautiful soul i've ever seen. You been through much and yet you love so purely. You are PERFECT. A WOMAN OF MY DREAMS, STRAIGHT FROM HEAVEN.
